title: PUCSL approves near four-hour power cuts for today
body_lines: Electricity regulator Public Utilities Commission of Sri Lanka (PUCSL) yesterday announced that approval was given following the Ceylon Electricity Board (CEB) request to enforce the approved three hours and 40-minute power cuts for today.
As per the PUCSL, two-hour power cuts will be imposed between 9 a.m. and 5 p.m. and one hour and 40-minute power cuts between 5 p.m. and 10 p.m. to areas A to L and P to W.
The areas designated as M,N,O,X,Y and Z will experience three-hour power cuts between 5 a.m. and 8 a.m.
Designated area CC will experience a straight three-hour power disruption from 6 a.m. to 9 a.m.
